query: 2. Looking for shoes that I can wear both at the gym and casual outings
actual_output:
Name: Nike Dunk Low SE ‘Sashiko Industrial Blue’, Description: Name: Nike Dunk Low SE ‘Sashiko Industrial Blue’
        Description: The Nike Dunk Low SE ‘Sashiko Industrial Blue’ delivers a recrafted take on the ‘80s sneaker icon. In lieu of a standard leather build, the upper is constructed from textile twill, featuring a white base with blue overlays and a color-matched Swoosh. Sashiko-style stitching enlivens the toe box and heel tab, while a woven Nike tag decorates the tongue. The sneaker is mounted on a rubber cupsole that pairs white sidewalls with a grippy blue rubber outsole.

query: 3. Need something for my daily morning jogs
actual_output:
Name: Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge, Description: Name: Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge
        Description: The Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge is inspired by the shoe this legendary runner was wearing in Rome in 2004 when he broke the 5K world record.

The Eliud Kipchoge Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK features a lightweight, breathable upper composed of white mesh. A thick red stripe courses from the midsole to the eyestays on the side panel, and the tail of the black outlined Nike Swoosh crosses over it. An off-white Zoom X foam midsole offers bounce and energy return in its light, responsive cushioning system. A full-length articulated plate is inserted under foot to deliver a propulsion sensation that provides a smooth transition at different paces. And finally, black rubber pods at the forefoot and heel comprise the durable outsole.

What we find most delightful about this elite running shoe are the personal Eliud Kipchoge touches. One medial midsole sports his motto "No human is limited," and the other features his signature. The Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge was released on August 31, 2023, for $160 retail.
        Colorway: White/Chile Red/Coconut Milk/Black
        Main Color: White
        Category: Running
retrieval_context:
Name: Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge, Description: Name: Nike Zoom Fly 5 EK Eliud Kipchoge

query: 1. My feet hurt after long walks, need something supportive
actual_output:
Name: Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Black Wolf Grey, Description: Name: Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Black Wolf Grey
        Description: The Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Black Wolf Gray is trail running sneaker with waterproof features.

Something that makes this shoe stand out is the Gore-Tex along the upper. It helps keep the foot dry without adding weight or sacrificing comfort. The sneaker boasts an all-black construction with Wolf Gray and reflective detailing. Flecks of reflective material in the laces and a strip along the side panels improve visibility in low lighting and add a pop of silver. Unlike other trail running sneakers, this version of the React Pegasus Trail 4 has less rubber on the outsole. This allows the runner to transition from rough terrain to pavement. Other notable features include the full-length Boost unit in the midsole and the grippy traction pattern underfoot.

Our StockX experts like that some versions of the sneaker feature ‘JUST DO IT’ along the midsole, while others display ‘JUST RUN IT.’ The Nike React Pegasus Trail 4 Gore-Tex Black Wolf Gray was released on August 9th, 2022, and retailed at $160.
        Colorway: Black/Wolf Grey-Reflective Silver
        Main Color: Black
        Category: Running

query: 1. I have flat feet, need something comfortable
actual_output:
Name: ASICS GEL-Kayano 14 Cream Sweet Pink, Description: Name: ASICS GEL-Kayano 14 Cream Sweet Pink
        Description: The ASICS GEL-Kayano 14 Cream Sweet Pink is a technical running sneaker boasting metallic silver and Sweet Pink accents.

While the Cream Sweet Pink ASICS GEL-Kayano 14’s mesh construction, including the web of faux-leather overlays and mesh underlays, pays homage to GEL-Kayano models from the early 2000s, the use of shiny metallic silver gives the sneaker a futuristic upgrade. In addition, Sweet Pink accents add pops of color on the midsole pods, the ASICS branding, and the rubber outsole. Toshikazu Kayano didn’t design this version of the GEL-Kayano; however, the shoe still maintains its iconic layered construction and GEL technology underfoot. This cushioning system provides advanced shock absorption without weighing down the foot.
